name: Brainfuck
description: Brainfuck is a guide and a highly-interactive simulator of the smallest complete programming language in the world. Master all of its 8 commands to program with capabilities equivalent to those of codes written in any other modern language.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2-core processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Internet Connection needed on the first run
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
